HomePage.heroAbout: I’m a web developer and in this space I share experiences, learnings, and reflections on development and technology.
HomePage.aboutDescription: I’m a web developer and in this space I share experiences, learnings, and reflections on development and technology. Each post is based on real cases, well-thought-out ideas, and tools I actually use day to day.
HomePage.aboutDescription2: This blog is made for developers, tech enthusiasts, and anyone who enjoys understanding how the digital world works from the inside.

Portfolio.heroAbout: A selection of my most recent projects and the technologies I work with.

Projects.blogCardosoDescription: Personal blog and portfolio built with Next.js and Sanity.
Projects.raffleSystemDescription: App to manage available numbers in a raffle, with an admin dashboard protected by authentication.
Projects.labfemDescription: Labfem was created to celebrate and highlight the voices, talents, and achievements of women who inspire through their work and commitment.
Projects.myDreamPlaceDescription: My Dream Place is a website for a fictional travel company. The goal of this project was to demonstrate the potential of using a decoupled site from the backend, allowing users to easily and effectively modify content.
Projects.hotelGatsbySiteDescription: Site built with Gatsby, GraphQL, and DatoCMS.
Projects.blogCafeDescription: Site built with HTML and CSS.
Projects.bienesRaicesDescription: Site built with HTML and CSS.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: You can reach me on any of my social networks or by sending an email directly :)
